reviewText: Great film for the entire family! It is a must have in your library if you have kids and want to share a positive, wholesome movie that they WILL enjoy!!!

Pirate's Dagger is a wonderful hidden gem.  I first enjoyed this film at a filmmaker's screening and have been waiting to see it available for purchase.

The message of "choosing your friends carefully" is subtle and timely.  Lots of good adventure and amazing sets . . . including a huge dark castle and a maze of lava flows.

It's great to have a kids film that is fun and fastpaced with a positive message that is subtle.

I strongly recommend for kids 5 - 10.
